hymn.title: Listen, listen your conscience speaks to you
hymn.category: Principles on How to Be a Proper Human Being—General

layout.singingstanza: Lis -- ten, lis -- ten, your con -- science speaks to you. If you will lis -- ten, you'll know what to do. When you o -- bey then you are hap -- py too. Lis -- ten to your con -- science speak the whole day through.

lyrics.stanza: Listen, listen, your conscience speaks to you. If you will listen, you'll know what to do. When you obey then you are happy too. Listen to your conscience speak the whole day through.
Listen, listen, your parents speak to you. If you will listen, you'll know what to do. When you obey then you are happy too. Listen to your parents speak the whole day through.
